The image displaying the electoral map w: 2. The data used in the image was claimed to come from CNN's 2012 presidential race election poll, but upon investigation, it was found that no one was asked if they were taxpayers.
The map presented is a doctored version: s map for 1920, which showed the results of the 2012 election if only white people had been allowed to vote.
Other maps published in the same article: such as the results if only white men, men (excluding women), people over age 24, or all eligible voters participated in the election.
